text: Legal terms
Audemars Piguet welcomes China's privacy policy
Last update date: October 31, 2021
label: Policy Change

text: Effective date: November 30, 2021
label: Policy Change

text: Audemars Piguet is to help build a connection between people to make the world more open and tolerant.
In short, the purpose of Euda Bybon is to build a world of home in the Quartet.
We are a community based on trust.
In order to win your trust, it is necessary to clearly explain to you how Aibi Ying uses your information and protect your privacy.

This privacy policy is applicable to users ("You" or "Members") in China ("You" or "Members") in China (not under this policy).Or how to deal with the personal information of your Piguet Piguet's platform.

However, if you (i) book the landlord/experience expert service outside China, or (ii) publish the landlord/experience expert service located outside China, even if your place of residence is in China, please go to Audemars Piguet to welcome the privacy policy page,Understand the specific personal information protection rules applicable to you, as well as data controller involved in personal information involved in overseas activities.
The unfielded terms in this privacy policy are the same as our definitions in our service terms ("terms").
Table of contents
1. Personal information processing and purpose
2. Sharing and disclosure
3. Other important information
4. How do we store your personal information
5. Your rights
6. About minor protection
7. Security
8. Modification of this privacy policy
9. Contact us
1. Personal information processing and purpose

text: 3. Other important information
3.1 Analysis of your communications

We may review, review or analyze the content of your communications on the Airbnb platform for the reasons described in the "Personal Information Processing and Purposes" section of this Policy, for fraud prevention, risk assessment, regulatory compliance, investigations, Product development, research, analysis, enforcement of our terms of service, policies, and for customer support.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: We review, review or analyze your communications on the Airbnb Platform.

text: For example, in fraud prevention, we may review and analyze information to hide contact information and links to other websites.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: We may review and analyze information to conceal contact information and links to other websites.

text: In some cases, we also review, audit or analyze information for the purpose of debugging, improving and expanding product services.
label: Usage

text: We will use automated methods where reasonably practicable.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: We will use automated methods where reasonably practicable.

text: However, we still sometimes need humans to review some communications for purposes such as investigating fraud incidents, customer support, or evaluating improved automated tool functionality.
label: Usage

text: We do not review, review or analyze the content of your communications for the purpose of sending third-party marketing communications, nor do we sell the results of reviewing or analyzing those communications.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: We do not review, review or analyze the content of your communications for the purpose of sending third-party marketing communications.

text: 7. Security
label: Data Security

Data Security

Data Security
rewrite: We have passed the protection evaluation of network security level, and also adopted management measures to protect personal information.

label: Important
Data Security
